venue.name: Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell

item.description:
Feb. 7th is the Kickoff of the Spring Semester for the Progressive Christians of Greater Lowell. We will be discussing Healthy Habits for the New Year: Getting Fit Relationally. Spring semester gatherings will be 7 sessions: 2/7, 2/14, 3/7, 3/21, 3/28, 4/11, 4/25. If Sundays don't work for you, two other Progressive Christians' groups meet at CCU on Saturday mornings (7:30am-9am) and Thursday nights (6:45pm-8:15pm). For more info. on the Saturday & Thursday groups, contact Chris (http://www.meetup.com...)

Meetup with other Lowell area socially progressive Christians at 11:45am on Sunday, Feb. 7th. Childcare is provided during our meeting.

If you are able, come to Christ Church United, UCC's 10am worship service (http://WeWelcomeAll.o...) prior to our progressive Christians' meetup. Quality nursery care and engaging Christian Education classes for children grades K-12 are available during the 10am service.
item.name: Grtr Lowell Progressive Christians Meetup
